name: Wormmon Dress Up Game
description:
One of 2 of my 2nd ever game. I learned how buttons work along with a few other things, allowing me to make a dress up game. I made Wormmon the star as I like this Digimon and a dress up game for this little guy sounds really endearing. Press the arrow buttons to pick out clothing for Wormmon.

The version you are playing here is so that it can be played on mobile devices.  Go to here if you want an unshrunk version.

Game made by MiniDragonfly (deviantart.com/minidragonfly)

Digimon © Bandai NAMCO Entertainment Inc | Akiyoshi Honga | Toei Animation
